apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this couple emoji beautifully illustrates two women, one with light skin tone and the other with medium-dark skin tone, embracing with a prominent, glowing red heart between them. Appleâ€™s design language imbues the figures with gentle curves and soft, realistic shading, while the heart radiates warmth with its glossy, 3D finish and bright highlights. This emoji celebrates love, partnership, and romantic relationships, offering a diverse and inclusive representation of affection.
